actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Emergency School Aid Act concerning the waiver of requirements.

summary.text: Amends the Emergency School Aid Act to permit giving aid under such Act to a local agency whose staff at each school is not racially or ethnically balanced upon adequate assurance that an affirmative action plan has been adopted which will eliminate such imbalance within a reasonable time.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Emergency School Aid Act concerning the waiver of requirements.
